```{r setup}
library(OMOPGenerics)
```

A codelist is a named list, with each item of the list containing concept IDs. 
```{r}
condition_codes <- list("diabetes" = c(201820, 4087682, 3655269),
                        "asthma" = 317009)
condition_codes <- codelist(condition_codes)

condition_codes
```
